data.name: Conquest of Champions: Mega-Hero Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Want to try them all? Start Conquest with all of the Heroes from the release set and the 1st expansion! This pack can only be purchased once.

This DLC Pack includes:

  • Buliwyf Stormstrike Hero from the Stonehold Faction
  • Gorin Stoneshaper Hero from the Stonehold Faction
  • Mua Tidewalker Hero from the Briarwood Faction
  • Krak Ironbark Hero from the Briarwood Faction
  • Valdrex Cindermaw Hero from the Embercult Faction
  • Blight Mistmantle Hero from the Embercult Faction

Total value for this DLC is roughly $30 as each Hero costs $5 in currency.

Note: No purchases are necessary in the game as you can unlock these Heroes by earning currency through playing the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1 GHZ
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any graphic card with 1 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any graphic card with 1 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.8
  • Processor: 1 GHZ
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any graphic card with 1 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.8.5
  • Processor: 2 GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: any graphic card with 1 GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
